page.title: 06 Hotels and Guest Houses
page.content: There are many places for holiday makers to stay; holiday camps, caravan sites, hotels, self catering and bed and breakfast. { Warners}is a holiday camp built before the war and at present being greatly modernised. It has 272 brick built chalets and can cater for about 1,500 people. {Blue Waters}was built in 1954. There are 300 wooden chalets owned by Ladbrokes. There is plenty of entertainment but the people provide their own food. At the moment they only open from April to September, but they are hoping to open for a longer period. There are only two proper Hotels left in Seaton, the rest having been turned into old peoples homes.
